action.action-desc: Mr. Young of Alaska (for himself and Mr. DeFazio) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require labeling of genetically engineered fish.

section.header: Amendment to the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act regarding genetically engineered salmon
section.text: Section 403 of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act (21 U.S.C. 343) is further amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: If it contains genetically engineered fish unless the food bears a label stating that the food contains genetically engineered fish.
